create_slice_timing

bidsprep.utils.create_slice_timing(nifti_file_or_img, slice_acquisition_method, ascending=True, interleaved_order='odd_first')[source]
Parameters:

  • nifti_file_or_img (str or Nifti1Image) – Path to the NIfTI file or a NIfTI image.

  • slice_acquisition_method (Literal["sequential", "interleaved"]) – Method used for acquiring slices.

  • ascending (bool, default=True) – If slices were collected in ascending order (True) or descending order (False).

  • interleaved_order (Literal["even_first", "odd_first"], default=”odd_first”) – If slices for interleaved acquisition were collected by acquiring the “even_first” or “odd_first” slices first.

Returns:

dict[int, float] – Dictionary mapping the slice number to the time the slice was aquired.
